original_title: The B-52s with the Wild Crowd! - Live in Athens, GA
overview: The B-52s were celebrating the 34th anniversary of their first-ever live show on Valentine’s Day in 1977 in the same town. This disc is also the first B52s concert now officially released on DVD. Not surprisingly, as the group had no new material to promote, it’s a retrospective of their work from 1979 to their last new studio album, 2008’s Funplex.
title: The B-52s with the Wild Crowd! - Live in Athens, GA
